__TOC__

* Contact: <nowiki>[[QBQ]]</nowiki> [StefanoRivera] [Dead_orc]
* Make: IBM
* Brand: ThinkPad
* Model: T30-2366
* Website: http://www.lenovo.com/

=== Hardware Details (QBQ) ===

* Intel Mobile Pentium 4-M - 2.0Ghz
* 2x 512MB RAM (PC2100)
* 60GB Toshiba HDD (9.5mm height because of Ultranav)
* DVD/CD-RW Combo Drive in Ultrabay Plus
* 14.1" TFT Screen, SVGA+ (1400x1050)
* ATI Mobile Radeon 7500 (16MB VRAM)
* WLAN 802.11b (IBM High Rate Wireless LAN Mini-PCI Adapter with Modem II)
* Ethernet (Intel)
* 56Kb Modem 
* Windows XP Professional

=== Current Issues ===
* HW & Software mixer both controlled by volume keys <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/145769|#145769]]</nowiki>
* External monitor doesn't seem to work
* HAL doesn't seem to interface with brightness correctly
* No Desktop Effects
* No Infra Red
